backend/main.mo: Defines core actor with authorization mixin, data types, maps for products, customers, bills, expenses, and owner login logic including password initialization and authentication.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions for numerous frontend files including app logic, screens, components, hooks, and offline storage behavior.
frontend/android/.gitignore: Specifies ignored Android build, configuration, and IDE files for the Android wrapper project.
frontend/android/app/build.gradle: Gradle build configuration for the Android wrapper, including SDK settings, build types, dependencies, and PWA URL validation task.
frontend/android/app/proguard-rules.pro: ProGuard rules preserving WebView interfaces, Kotlin metadata, and wrapper classes for release builds.
frontend/android/app/src/main/AndroidMan: Manifest defining permissions, app metadata, launch activity, deep linking, and configuration settings for the Android wrapper.
frontend/android/app/src/main/java/com/f: Android activity that initializes and configures a fullscreen WebView, enabling modern web features and handling navigation and errors.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/mipmap: Defines the round adaptive launcher icon referencing the same background and foreground assets.
Defines the adaptive app launcher icon using background and foreground drawables.
frontend/android/app/src/main/res/values: Provides the ic_launcher_background color value used by adaptive icons.
Contains app name, PWA URL config, and user-facing error/loading strings.
Defines the app themes, including primary colors and fullscreen configuration.
frontend/android/build.gradle: Top-level Gradle build configuration with Kotlin and Android plugin setup.
frontend/android/dist/.gitkeep: Placeholder file ensuring the dist directory is tracked in version control.
frontend/android/gradle.properties: Gradle settings enabling AndroidX, Jetifier, performance flags, and optional PWA URL injection.
frontend/android/gradle/wrapper/gradle-w: Configures the Gradle wrapper to use Gradle 8.2 with distribution and timeout settings.
frontend/android/README.md: Documentation describing the Android WebView wrapper for the PWA, build requirements, configuration, and release validation steps.
frontend/android/scripts/build-release-a: Build script that validates PWA URL, compiles the release APK, verifies filename, and stages versioned output.
frontend/android/scripts/publish-release: Script that locates the latest built APK, computes metadata, and prepares it for publishing with a unique ID.
frontend/android/settings.gradle: Configures plugin management, repository resolution, and includes the app module.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point loading the PWA, icons, and service worker with cache-busting build ID.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and standalone display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing cache versioning, app shell caching, and network-first/navigation strategies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app controller handling authentication, profile loading, screen navigation, and build-version cache resets.
frontend/src/auth/passwordAuth.tsx: Provides a context-based password auth system with localStorage persistence and login/logout helpers.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with side navigation, mobile drawer, top bar, content area, and footer.
Displays startup or authorization errors with retry, reset cache, and optional auth-clear actions.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDialog.t: Dialog for creating or editing customers with form handling and offline queue integration.
Mobile side drawer listing navigable screens with icons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/ProductDialog.ts: Dialog for creating or updating products, validating fields and queuing offline actions.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableC: Renders data as card-style rows for small screens with a customizable empty state.
frontend/src/components/RootErrorBoundar: Global error boundary showing a fallback UI with reload and reset options.
frontend/src/components/SideNav.tsx: Renders a sidebar navigation menu and persists/restores the last selected screen using localStorage.
frontend/src/components/SyncIndicator.ts: Displays online status, pending sync count, and errors with a retry option based on sync state.
frontend/src/components/TopBar.tsx: Shows the app header with menu button, title, sync indicator, and a user profile menu with logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login, logout, and status handling through a React context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Tracks PWA installability and exposes a function to trigger the install prompt.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for authentication, user profiles, products, and other backend operations using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStartupWatchdog.ts: Monitors startup loading phases and triggers a timeout with diagnostics if initialization hangs.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, and forces opaque Radix UI overlays and sheet components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, loading global styles.
frontend/src/offline/storage.ts: Provides localStorage-based caching and an offline action queue with add, remove, and retry utilities.
frontend/src/offline/useOfflineQueue.ts: React hook that executes actions immediately when online or queues them for later when offline.
frontend/src/offline/useSyncStatus.ts: Tracks online status and processes queued offline actions using the actor, updating pending counts and errors.
frontend/src/screens/BillingScreen.tsx: Billing UI that builds bill line items, validates inventory, calculates totals, and submits or queues bill creation.
frontend/src/screens/CreditsScreen.tsx: Displays customer credit summaries by aggregating bill data, with table and card views for different screen sizes.
frontend/src/screens/CustomersScreen.tsx: Displays and manages customers with admin‑only add, edit, and delete actions using offline queueing.
frontend/src/screens/DashboardScreen.tsx: Shows summary stats for products, customers, bills, credits, and sync status, plus recent activity metrics.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Handles role‑based login with password auth, actor initialization checks, and error normalization.
frontend/src/screens/ProductsScreen.tsx: Lists products with stock indicators and admin‑only create, edit, and delete actions via offline queue.
frontend/src/screens/ReportsScreen.tsx: Generates sales and expense reports, and lets admins manage expenses with offline sync support.
frontend/src/utils/authErrors.ts: Normalizes backend auth errors into simplified user‑friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/billingTotals.ts: Utilities for calculating billing totals, discounts, and GST, including legacy bill handling.
frontend/src/utils/buildInfo.ts: Defines a BUILD_ID constant used to detect and refresh deployments.
frontend/src/utils/printInvoice.ts: Generates formatted invoice HTML, consolidates product lines, computes totals, and triggers browser printing.
frontend/src/utils/reporting.ts: Provides functions for calculating daily sales, date‑range summaries, and profit data from bills, products, and expenses.
frontend/src/utils/resetCachedApp.ts: Clears storage, caches, and service workers, then reloads the page to reset the app.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, layout, animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Records project metadata, state version, known login issues, and feature requirements.
